item.title: Reading from GitHub
item.description: I've made some changes to the structure of the Pico platform and this instance is now reading from a remote GitHub repository. It makes publishing easier because I don't have to connect to a server and copy files into a directory.
item.author: Your name

item.title: Tiny Thoughts
item.description: Firing up a new section of the oh hey. This is a lighter-weight version of the blog, somewhere to put small, mostly unfiltered thoughts.
item.author: Your name
